categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: A female Human Sith acolyte served under Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Xedrix and, alongside another apprentice, went with her master to Bosthirda in 3954 BBY, where they were all killed by Scourge.
The acolyte deeply cared for the other acolyte, and Scourge used it against them.
